website_summaries.verdict: A ton of tools for beveling and edging
pros: Lots of variety in this set
This set will work well for a beginner because there are a lot of options for experimentation
cons: Includes a lot of stamping punch patterns, but no letter or number stamps

customer_reviews.title: Good beginners kit: variety and quality!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the tools are pretty poor quality but the rest is well made and convenient. I love the variety in this kit, the cost, comparable to other kits I researched. I definitely recommend if you’re getting into the hobby of leather The items I didn’t find “of good quality”: the stitching all, and the beveler
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great set for begginers
customer_reviews.text: I just start leather craft and this set was perfect for me to play and learn the tools.I recomand it for begginers
customer_reviews.author: Nitu Nicoleta

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good value for beginners to intermediate
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stitch punches, spacing is great and I like that they aren't just plain steel. There are plenty of good stamps, though about half are duplicates for me. I can't attest to the quality of everything yet. Some are definitely good quality tools, some seem cheap and flimsy, but once again I haven't used them all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Egbert

customer_reviews.title: Impressive leather working kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very complete set for anyone beginning or getting back into leather work. I'm getting back into it and I must say I am really impressed with the quality and quantity of the tools included. There is very little if anything else needed. This set is better than the stuff I'm replacing so I have no complaints and only cheers got this product.
customer_reviews.author: G-FAB

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: This leather tool kit is garbage....Don't waste your money !!
customer_reviews.author: zredman

customer_reviews.title: This set contains everything you need to get started but the leather.
customer_reviews.text: A great set at a bargain price. The quality is about the same as the the expensive sets. If I stay at this long enough to wear anything out I'll consider buying the high dollar stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Cluckers

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. I am new to leather crafting and wanted to save time by getting a kit. It’s not worth it. As other reviews have said, most of these tools are REALLY cheaply made and haven’t even lasted through my first little project. My best suggestion is to try to find quality tools that will last so you’re not wasting twice the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for the price. It feels like its missing items. In my case it was missing a few things. A tracing pen. Beeswax. And it doesnt come with some essentials like a swivel knife and cutters. Hammer is tiny btw. If your just starting and your on a budget its fine. But if u can spend a little more get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items in this kit are so cheaply made that I had to rebuy everything. The knives come dull as can be, cheap stamps, I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit, very good value.
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes a number of very useful tools at a bargain price. While some tools feel light, they appear sturdy, and are not impact bearing tools anyway. Impact bearing tools appear very well made. The simple guide book is excellent for introductory work. All cutting edges are very sharp and all impression tools have clear lines for good impressions. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robert stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing a lot of these tools to get started on some projects. This is gonna help me get started quickly and eventually invest in higher end tools if these don't stand up from use.
customer_reviews.author: Christina G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy good tools instead.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good kit for people that just want to mess around with leather for a couple months but the tools are junk if you actually want to go far in leather crafting. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more money on the Barry king tool pack on Barrykingtools.com so you don’t end up doing what I did and buy it all anyway and throw this stuff away.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Crook

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend who has been experimenting with leather tooling and he has really enjoyed the variety of tools that come with this kit. He also said the quality is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Avery good value.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the occasion, as of yet to use the tools,but I think they will be a joy to use when I get to the task of putting something together.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ollen Rush

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great birthday gift for my son the crafty one that loves different hobbies
customer_reviews.author: Donna Glover

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: No instructions so I had to watch videos & research the different tools. It’s not for beginners however, it’s perfect & value added for those that know how
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Howell

customer_reviews.title: Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting started in leather word. Been fun sue far. Tool kit has been useful so far.
customer_reviews.author: LesBarney

customer_reviews.title: Just a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was just starting out when I got this, it literally gives you all youll need to start out (with the exception of the leather and dyes if youre gonna use them) and continues to have many tools I can use as my skills increase
customer_reviews.author: Austin Weigle

customer_reviews.title: Very much an average starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces in this set are good starter tools. Others are cheap. After opening, will probably have additional costs replacing some tools because of quality. Would have been a fair/good deal at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be good and sharp only a hand full of thing the idk what they are used for ar as and what not but other then that 👍. I have used a few items and they all work grate cant wait to actually make some stuff with them now
customer_reviews.author: Jcole619

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners got this to get back in to leather work and it was fantastic start
customer_reviews.author: brandon scott

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great. My husband bought this set for a new interest in leather working. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Butterbreadandjam

customer_reviews.title: Zero customer service, broken groover
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken stitching groover. Very disappointed as grooving is huge before stitching. To add another bad taste I sent them an email about it and never got a response. I would just fork out the additional money for quality over quantity. The customer service obviously didn’t care.
customer_reviews.author: William Green

customer_reviews.title: No inventory sheet
customer_reviews.text: There was no inventory sheet nor an explanation of what was what. I bought this kit to get started in leather working but had to buy a book on leather tools and their use. Some of the items are poor quality. Others came in package with Chinese writing only which wasnt helpful.
customer_reviews.author: T S R

customer_reviews.title: Great start
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when I thought of trying leather work as a new hobby and was looking for something to give me an overall start. I think this was a great purchase because it gave me everything I needed to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Christina zornio

customer_reviews.title: everything needed to start leather work as a hobby is in the kit for
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I ordered for myself and great grand son while he is here for the holidays. The only thing that would be more helpful is an instruction booklet.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: 356 Pieces Leathercraft Tool Kit.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, although I'm not a beginner there are many tools that I liked in this product that I didn't have. Now I do. This kit is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have a listing of what each tool does especially for beginners who get this package. Seems to be a nice package, Haven't used all the tools yet.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Its a good starter set but will definitely want to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This set is good to start some smaller leather crafts. However, if you really enjoy leather work, you will want to upgrade in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great option over trying to get this all separate at local stores. Way less money too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a bunch of worn out and miss matched tools. I's perfect for what I need. Is it top quality stuff? No. But then again its only 80 bucks. I am very pleased with tit.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Leather Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: Tons of leather working goodies. Even a nice step-by-step technique book. Very happy with my new tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Got the Kit and Pulled everything out used the punch and the Nylon "hammer" Broke Went to use several tools and POORLY made Honestly dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kit at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my wife for Christmas. Everything it came with is made extremely well. She was very excited. Looking forward to purchasing additional products from Dorhui.
customer_reviews.author: R. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these to start our horse tack business, and they are great for starting out!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful kit contains all tools needed Good quality Derserves to be bought 😉
customer_reviews.author: omneya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it and expected it to come in a week. It showed up less than 24 hours! Love the booklet it comes with! Great package deal!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they designed for beginners, it should also include some speciality tools for advanced ones too.
customer_reviews.author: A.  Razo

customer_reviews.title: I am still satisfied with the set.
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces not very sharp. I had to Bri sharpen a few.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas LaFavers

customer_reviews.title: Great value.....a lot of tools
customer_reviews.text: Have not found a use for all of this stuff.....Yet
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as advertised. great setup for someone just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for starters
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners like myself solid tools multiple needles an all around great buy
customer_reviews.author: jake marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great kit and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Exactly what I expected. Everything you need to get started with leather crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia McDonell

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Some products are cheap but some are very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing products, Poor quality and Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: some products in the package are missing. Very bad. I will request a refund. Very poor quality. You are deceiving people.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Maho

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cheap simple starter kit. I used it to see if it was something that I would like to get into
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, still may need a couple things depending on the project you are working on
customer_reviews.author: Tandon N. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your money
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient was thrilled to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Angelicchio

customer_reviews.title: Manual with kit?
customer_reviews.text: The manual was missing from my kit, how can I get one?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for someone who is interested in leather working
customer_reviews.text: These were all great quality leather working tools and I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: gabethomas

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit gave it to my mom as a gift she is so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael lopez

customer_reviews.title: 356 piece leather crafting kit
customer_reviews.text: This Kit is ok , for the person wanting to see if leather working is something for them , definitely not the quality of tools one would purchase if leather working was their job. I also believe that the marketer of this kit adds insignificant tiny items for the sake of saying its a 356 piece kit. For example (a tin foil thimble) “useless” dollar store (or lesser quality) scissors ect . Ide much rather have lesser items with higher quality..... for the 85.00
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W.

customer_reviews.title: Ok starter set but not quality tools
customer_reviews.text: This set was given as a gift to my wife who is just starting out leathercrafting. She likes that it came with so many different tools to try, but they aren't high quality and it's a struggle to use a few of them. Overall, I can't complain. I knew what price range I was in, and the goal was to try everything out and determine which ones would be worth replacing with higher quality tools later on. Decent value.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenAge

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners. Has almost everything a beginner will need.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very good for the price. It has a lot of tools and it's unreasonably priced for what comes in it. I only wish it came with a better stitching awl for handheld stitching. I think the awl that comes with it is a cheaper version of the handy stitch awl without the bobbin in the handle and what I am looking for is an actual sewing awl.
customer_reviews.author: Cree81v3N4m3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good kit been using it haven't had any problems yet
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set! Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Steve-O

customer_reviews.title: Lots for the $
customer_reviews.text: I got this to get a hand full of starter tools i needed. Surprised by how much is in this kit, quality wasn’t amazing but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kail Withers

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal hobbies.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. I am a beginner and I like the package.
customer_reviews.author: Conde Man

product_meta.title: Dorhui 356 Pieces Leathercraft Tools Kit, Leather Working Tools and Supplies, Leather Craft Stamping Tools, Rivets Tools, Stitching Groover, Prong Punch, Leather Working Saddle Making Tools
feature_bullets: ★【Leather Kit with Leather Tool Manual】 - 356 pcs leather craft tools kit with leather tool manual, includes Stamping Punch Tools, 240 pcs Snaps and Rivets Kit, Cutting Mat, Nylon Hammer, Prong Punch, Adjustable Edge Creaser, Edge Cutter, and Leather Repair Kit that can meet your basic needs for sewing different leather, canvas, fabric, denim, tarpaulin, paper or other projects

★【Long Term Use】- Dorhui leather working tools and supplies not only including self-healing cutting mat, protect the prong punch, hole punch and table, also including a wooden handle nylon hammer, nylon part can absorb extra strength and avoid overexertion, so that punch tools and stamping tools can be used for a longer time. Dorhui leather tools will give you many years of service.

★【Make Your Own Unique Design and Pattern】- Dorhui leather stamping tools with 20 Pieces most popular Saddle Making Tools, 1 pieces Carving Knife and 5 pieces Tracing pen, you can create your own patterns on the leather for wallets, handbags, belt etc. Make it unique and beautiful.

★【Leather Tools for Hobbyists】- Gather all the leather working tools you need. Including leather cutting knife, 240 pcs Snaps and Rivets Kit, 7 different sizes half-round cutter punch, sewing scissors and stainless steel rule. There are tools to complete almost any project with detailing. Dorhui leather crafting tools meet all your leather work.

★【Perfect Christmas Gift】- Dorhui leather crafting tools suitable for beginner and proficient. It's a perfect choice for small gifts to family, friends especially for DIY hand stitching lovers.This will be a unique and unexpected Father's Day gift.
